column4: i been playing with iwconfig and ifconfig (removed networkmanager for the time being) i can connect to my wireless server but i dont really know how to disconnect from it anyone know the command for it ?
i wanna disconnect give it new info for another network and connect but bringing the device down the up again will just connect to the old one again :(
perhaps ifdown dev, iwconfig dev mode managed, iwconfig dev channel ch, iwconfig essid id, ifconfig dev up or ifup dev
